gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Heat 115, Hornets 104
gameRecap.excerpt: The Heat defeated the Hornets, 115-104. Duncan Robinson recorded 23 points, three assists, and two rebounds for the Heat, while Jaime Jaquez Jr. added 17 points, eight assists, and six rebounds in the victory. Terry Rozier tallied 28 points and seven assists for the Hornets in the losing effort. The Heat improve to 14-10 in the regular season, while the Hornets fall to 7-15.
